scripts.verify: concurrently --names "LINT,TEST,TYPECHECK,LINT-CUSTOM" -c "bgMagenta.bold,bgGreen.bold,bgBlue.bold,bgCyan.bold" "pnpm run lint" "pnpm run test --silent" "pnpm run typecheck"

scripts.build: pnpm run build:cjs && pnpm run build:esm
scripts.prepublishOnly: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build
